org.measure.platform.framework.config

Class DefaultProfileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.measure.platform.framework.config.DefaultProfileUtil

  • public final class DefaultProfileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to load a Spring profile to be used as default when there is no spring.profiles.active set in the environment or as command line argument. If the value is not available in application.yml then dev profile will be used as default.

    • Structure Diagram
